assistance.faq1_q: How do I sell a skin?
assistance.faq1_a: Go to your inventory, select the skin you want to sell, then click 'Sell'. You can set your price, choose the currency, and track your listing in the 'My Listings' tab. Once sold, the amount will be credited to your OPNSKIN wallet.
assistance.faq2_q: What payment methods do you accept?
assistance.faq2_a: We accept payments by credit card (Visa, Mastercard), PayPal, and several cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, etc.). All transactions are secure and your information remains confidential.
assistance.faq3_q: How long does it take to get a response?
assistance.faq3_a: Our support team is committed to responding to all requests within 24 to 48 hours. During busy periods, this delay may be exceptionally extended, but we always do our best to reply quickly.
assistance.faq4_q: How do I ensure the security of my transactions?
assistance.faq4_a: All transactions on OPNSKIN are protected by advanced security protocols. We never share your personal data and use verification systems to prevent any fraud attempts. Feel free to enable two-factor authentication on your Steam account for enhanced security.
assistance.faq5_q: What should I do if I have a problem with a purchase or sale?
assistance.faq5_a: If you encounter an issue (payment not received, skin not delivered, etc.), contact us via the support form below, specifying the subject and details of the problem. Our team will review your case and keep you informed by email as soon as possible.
assistance.faq6_a: Once a transaction is validated and the skin transferred, it can no longer be canceled. If the transaction has not yet been finalized, contact support quickly to see if a solution is possible.
assistance.title: Support & FAQ
